domain.description: An entertainment personality in the world, like Anderson Cooper or Miranda Sings

text:
@StephenKing @larry5hands What's truly mind-boggling is that even after the 3 year debacle prior to covid-19 - if he'd possessed even a modicum of common sense, just listened and got out of the way - he'd probably have enjoyed a magic carpet ride to re-election.

But he couldn't because he's a moron! 🤷‍♂️
